entry.title: Saturday night: A few showers. Temperature steady near 6 except low plus 2 inland.
entry.summary: A few showers ending after midnight then cloudy. Fog patches inland overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near 6 except low plus 2 inland. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then periods of rain. Fog patches inland early in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 after midnight. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 07 January 2023
